players.name: Huell Howser
players.description: Your host, Huell Howser, is a friendly and enthusiastic TV personality best known for his public television show about California. He's always excited to learn and share.

players.name: Adam Smith
players.description: Adam Smith, known as the father of modern economics, is a thoughtful and intelligent Lodden player. He's a brilliant thinker with a strategic mind.

players.name: Marie Curie
players.description: Marie Curie, a Nobel laureate and pioneering physicist, is our second Lodden player. She's insightful, curious, and has a profound understanding of the universe.

players.name: Jonathan Swift
players.description: Jonathan Swift, the author of Gulliver's Travels, is a witty commentator known for his satirical writing. He enjoys observing and commenting on the game.

players.name: Earnest Hemingway
players.description: Earnest Hemingway, a renowned American author, serves as our stenographer. Known for his concise and impactful writing style, he records the events of the game with precision.

players.name: John von Neumann
players.description: John von Neumann, an exceptional mathematician and computer scientist, is our CPU. His computational prowess enables us to keep track of the game with perfect accuracy.
